scripts.dev: NODE_OPTIONS='--max-http-header-size=24576' next dev -p 3001 & yarn deploy-local & nodemon --watch groups.ts --exec 'yarn compute-tree'
scripts.register-root: cast rpc anvil_impersonateAccount 0xCA0583A6682607282963d3E2545Cd2e75697C2bb && cast send 0x5449Cc7A7E4024a7192d70c9Ce60Bb823993fd81 --rpc-url http://127.0.0.1:8545/ --from 0xCA0583A6682607282963d3E2545Cd2e75697C2bb 'registerRoot(uint256)'
scripts.deploy-local: yarn deploy-airdrop-0-contract && yarn deploy-airdrop-1-contract && yarn deploy-airdrop-2-contract && yarn generate-abi
scripts.deploy-airdrop-0-contract: forge script DeployAirdropLevel0 --rpc-url http://localhost:8545 -vv --mnemonics 'test test test test test test test test test test test junk' --sender '0xf39Fd6e51aad88F6F4ce6aB8827279cffFb92266' --broadcast
scripts.deploy-airdrop-1-contract: forge script DeployAirdropLevel1 --rpc-url http://localhost:8545 -vv --mnemonics 'test test test test test test test test test test test junk' --sender '0xf39Fd6e51aad88F6F4ce6aB8827279cffFb92266' --broadcast
scripts.deploy-airdrop-2-contract: forge script DeployAirdropLevel2 --rpc-url http://localhost:8545 -vv --mnemonics 'test test test test test test test test test test test junk' --sender '0xf39Fd6e51aad88F6F4ce6aB8827279cffFb92266' --broadcast
